metadata.description: Spells that wither, destroy, or corrupt plants and plant-based materials

spells.name: Wither the Verdant Field
spells.description: This spell causes all plants in a large area to wither and die instantly. Crops fail, grass turns brown, and even mighty trees begin to sicken. The effect is permanent, leaving the land barren and lifeless.

spells.name: Destroy the Wooden Weapon
spells.description: This spell completely destroys a single wooden object, causing it to crumble to dust instantly. It can destroy wooden weapons, tools, or small structures. The wood simply disintegrates, leaving no trace behind.

spells.name: Blight of the Farmer's Nightmare
spells.description: This curse creates a spreading blight that affects all plants within a large area for an entire season. Plants wither, crops fail, and new growth becomes stunted and diseased. The blight slowly spreads beyond the original boundary.

spells.name: Rot the Stored Grain
spells.description: This spell causes stored plant materials to rot and become inedible. Grain, flour, dried fruits, and similar preserved foods become moldy and spoiled. The spell can ruin an entire storehouse of food supplies.

spells.name: Curse of the Barren Grove
spells.description: This powerful curse prevents any plant growth in a large area for an entire year. Not only do existing plants die, but seeds will not germinate and any attempt to grow plants in the cursed area fails completely.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (prevent plant growth), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +3 Structure

spells.name: Splinter the Mighty Oak
spells.description: This spell destroys a single large tree by causing it to explode into splinters. The tree literally tears itself apart from within, creating a dangerous shower of wooden shards in all directions. Anyone nearby may be injured by flying debris.

spells.name: Dissolve the Rope Bonds
spells.description: This spell destroys rope, cord, or twine made from plant fibers. The bonds simply disintegrate, freeing anyone tied up with such materials. The spell only affects plant-based ropes, not metal chains or leather thongs.

spells.name: Poison of the Withered Leaf
spells.description: This spell corrupts edible plants, making them poisonous to consume. Fruits, vegetables, and herbs become toxic, causing illness in anyone who eats them. The corruption is not visible, making detection difficult without magical means.

spells.name: Destroy the Forest's Heart
spells.description: This devastating spell can destroy an entire forest, causing all plant life within the boundary to wither and die instantly. The spell creates a permanent wasteland where once mighty trees stood. Only the most powerful magi can cast such destruction.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (destroy vast plant life), +3 Sight, +4 Boundary

spells.name: Crumble the Parchment Scroll
spells.description: This spell destroys paper, parchment, and other writing materials made from plants. Books crumble to dust, scrolls disintegrate, and important documents are reduced to nothing. The spell can target multiple items simultaneously.

spells.name: Curse of the Bitter Harvest
spells.description: This terrible curse affects an entire region's agriculture for a full year. All crops become stunted and bitter, providing minimal nourishment even when they do grow. The curse can cause widespread famine if cast on fertile farmland.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (corrupt plant growth), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +4 Boundary

spells.name: Burn Without Flame
spells.description: This spell destroys wooden structures by causing them to simply vanish as if consumed by invisible fire. Unlike actual burning, there are no flames, smoke, or heat - the wood simply ceases to exist. This can collapse entire wooden buildings instantly.
